publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2275 Sandra White: Working Creatively for Scotland: Glasgow Science Centre—That the Parliament recognises the important contribution that Scotland’s science centres, particularly Glasgow Science Centre, make to Scotland; notes the ongoing talks between the Cabinet Secretary for Education and Lifelong Learning and science centre managers, and urges the Scottish Government to ensure adequate funding to enable Glasgow Science Centre and others to work creatively for science in Scotland. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*
